content: ¤:cite(["initial_prompt"]):¤ Welcome to Module 1 of the E-health course! This module will help you understand what Schizophrenia is, the symptoms, causes, and how to prevent relapses. We'll cover this topic through a series of submodules, each ending with a few questions to test your understanding. It's important to answer these questions correctly before we can move on to the next section. Please feel free to ask any questions along the way, and let's make this an interactive learning experience. Are you ready to begin?
